sub_topic: Prove that the symmetric difference of two sets is not distributive over complement.
message_1: Let A = {1, 2, 3} and B = {2, 3, 4}. Find the symmetric difference of (A Δ B) and its complement (A Δ B)' and show that it is not equal to the symmetric difference of the complements of A and B, i.e., A' Δ B'.
